languages.text: "Хорошо, что ты это понимаешь. Как бы ни было тяжело признавать, но милосердие — это слабость и дверь для греха".

traits.locale_text: "Хорошо, что ты это понимаешь. Как бы ни было тяжело признавать, но милосердие — это слабость и дверь для греха".
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: "It's good that you realise this. It may be difficult to admit, but mercy is a weakness and a gateway for degradation."
languages.original_text: "Хорошо, что ты это понимаешь. Как бы ни было тяжело признавать, но милосердие — это слабость и дверь для греха".

traits.locale_text: "It's good that you realize this. It may be difficult to admit, but mercy is a weakness and a gateway for sin."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

traits.locale_text: "It's good that you realize this. It may be difficult to admit, but mercy is a weakness and a gateway for sin."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

traits.locale_text: "It's good that you realize this. It may be difficult to admit, but mercy is a weakness and a gateway for sin."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

traits.locale_text: "It's good that you realize this. It may be difficult to admit, but mercy is a weakness and a gateway for sin."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

traits.locale_text: "It's good that you realise this. It may be difficult to admit, but mercy is a weakness and a gateway for degradation."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: “你能意识到这点，很好。或许很难承认这一点，但仁慈是一种弱点，是通往堕落的通道。”
languages.original_text: "It's good that you realise this. It may be difficult to admit, but mercy is a weakness and a gateway for degradation."

traits.locale_text: “你能意识到这点，很好。或许很难承认这一点，但仁慈是一种弱点，是通向罪恶的通道。”
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: «Me alegro de que sea consciente. Puede que admitirlo sea tarea ardua, pero la piedad es una debilidad y un camino a la degeneración».
languages.original_text: "It's good that you realise this. It may be difficult to admit, but mercy is a weakness and a gateway for degradation."

traits.locale_text: «Me alegro de que sea consciente. Puede que admitirlo sea tarea ardua, pero la piedad es una debilidad y un camino al pecado».
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: 「そう言っていただけて安心しました。認めるのは難しいかもしれませんが、慈悲は弱さであり、堕落への間口となるのです」
languages.original_text: "It's good that you realise this. It may be difficult to admit, but mercy is a weakness and a gateway for degradation."

traits.locale_text: 「そう言っていただけて安心しました。認めるのは難しいかもしれませんが、慈悲は弱さであり、罪への間口となるのです」
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: "Es ist gut, dass Ihr das erkennt. Es mag schwer sein, das zuzugeben, aber Gnade ist eine Schwäche und ein Zugang für den Verfall."
languages.original_text: "It's good that you realise this. It may be difficult to admit, but mercy is a weakness and a gateway for degradation."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist gut, dass Ihr das erkennt. Es mag schwer sein, das zuzugeben, aber Gnade ist eine Schwäche und ein Zugang für die Sünde."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: « Il est bon que vous vous en rendiez compte. C'est peut-être difficile à admettre, mais la pitié est une faiblesse et une porte ouverte à la dégradation. »
languages.original_text: "It's good that you realise this. It may be difficult to admit, but mercy is a weakness and a gateway for degradation."

traits.locale_text: « Il est bon que vous vous en rendiez compte. C'est peut-être difficile à admettre, mais la pitié est une faiblesse et une porte ouverte au péché. »
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: "Bunun farkında olman güzel. Kabul etmesi zor belki ama merhamet zayıflıktır ve çöküşe götürür."
languages.original_text: "It's good that you realise this. It may be difficult to admit, but mercy is a weakness and a gateway for degradation."

traits.locale_text: "Bunun farkında olman güzel. Kabul etmesi zor olabilir ama merhamet zayıflıktır ve çürümeye yol açar."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian
